item.description:
Best Friends is hosting an indoor playtime session for our dog friends. We have a great way for them to exercise, socialize AND support the Rocky Hill Park & Rec Dept in building a brand new dog park in Elm Ridge Park! The playtime session will meet THE FIRST SATURDAY OF EVERY MONTH and the cost will be $5 to attend. 100% of the money collected will be donated to the park fund.
Looking for something fun to do with you pet on a lazy Saturday afternoon? Come & play while supporting a good cause!
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the froont desk, meet-ups are held in the doggy daycamp room.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Rocky Hill Dog Park Playtime
